Articles.Content: Does anyone ever read them? I don't, because every topic is pinned, I have no idea what's relevant.
Well, they don't come out very often, and the newest one is at the top, with an unread marker, so do have a suggestion as to how we could make it more plain?

Well, they don't come out very often, and the newest one is at the top, with an unread marker, so do have a suggestion as to how we could make it more plain?

Deleting old ones? Looking at it now the latest isn't obvious except for the fact it's at the top. Archive announcement subforum?

I would think that simply un-pinning the announcements that are more than a few weeks old would be a decent way to go... though, really, if it's at all possible, having just the most recent announcement pinned to distinguish it, and then have the rest of the threads sorted using the date from the OP rather than the last posted date might be best.

Having the threads sorted by OP date means you don't have to pin the most recent topics, they'll be at the top

I personally only ever browse the New Posts Link so don't even know what's stickied or not.
